Title: Mite Not Right
Description:
This not good. Fancy fire bees have mites!

Janky seen this before. Hive get infested, good bugs get sucked dry. End bad. Need do something!

Blast bees with smoke. Makes bees sleepy but mites hate!

When jump off, you squish before they bite bees again.
ObjectivesText: Cleanse fire bees of their infestation with Janky's scented smoke and kill the offending mites.
RewardText: Only good mite, dead mite. Good job.
